Have you ever imagined to be part of one of the biggest food companies in the world?Nourish life is our commitment. A large team that has a global vision, without leaving aside the local needs.Each member of our team is important to make BRF one of the largest food companies in the world. We are guided by values that serve as a compass for our work. Ethics in all actions, transparency in our value chain and innovation are non-negotiable points for us.Come and join us to be part of this food giant!BRF values and promotes an inclusive and diverse culture. We consider persons with disabilities for all our opportunities.#WeareBRFJob DescriptionAnalyse and report unit cost and inventory movements.
Support agro and factory operation in terms of costing and inventory.
Analyse and report costing accounts.
Making necessary accounting adjustments.
Support the MIS area with the implementation of cost drivers in order to ensure the correct cost allocation in the products.
Identify opportunities in the production to improve the cost efficiency, intermediating the interaction between the MIS and other areas such as Commercial, S&OP, logistics, etc
Work in close relationship with external and internal auditors.
Additional controller duties if necessary.Desirable requirementsGraduated from the Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences of the Universities or from the Departments of Industrial Engineering, Management Engineering, Mathematics
Minimum 1 years of experience in Finance, Accounting or Controlling or related areas,
Fluency in English both written and verbally,
Good communication skills and a team player,
Strategic thinker with analytical skills, high achievement drive and ability of taking initiative
Self-motivated,
High reporting ability,
Strong MS Excel and Power point skills,
Living in Bandırma or willing to live in Bandırma.Stay tuned on our Website to be aware about all the job opportunities we have!Job Details
